title: FS/FT:  Signed T201 Larry Doyle SOLD

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  Signed T201 Larry Doyle SOLD
posts.post_content:
I'm selling one of my signed T201 dupes.  You can see it on ebay here:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/171957327314?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]

For my good friends at Net54, I can do $0LD via PayPal friends/family.

I would also accept trades for T206 cards that I need for my set.  All grades and conditions welcome!

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested.

Thanks!

Paul

Gearing up for a purchase, huh?

:)
Close... funding the purchase of my Signed T206 Murray! :D
Right on. You have one of the coolest collections.

Thanks!

I would also consider trades for T206 cards that I need for my set. All grades and conditions welcome!
